message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to purchase it from me for $200?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Could you consider meeting me at that price?
I understand you're looking to get a good deal, but I'm not sure I can meet you at $120. How about we meet in the middle at $180?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $160?
I'm willing to make one more concession, but I really need to make a profit on this sale. How about we meet at $170?
I'm getting close to walking away, but I still think we can find a mutually beneficial price. Would you be willing to go down to $165?
I'm not sure I can go any lower than $170, but I'm willing to throw in a bonus feature to sweeten the deal. How about we meet at $165, and I'll include a free accessory that normally costs $20?
